Title: Boys And Girls
Plot: Jan holds a "Women in the Workplace" seminar at Dunder-Mifflin for the paper company's female employees.  Michael, feeling more than a bit left out, decides to have his own "seminar" when he takes the male workers down to the warehouse.
GuestStars: Craig Robinson, Patrice O'Neal, Creed Bratton, Karly Rothenberg, Mindy Kaling, Paul Lieberstein
